name: Classic Mario World 2: The Great Alliance
overview: A hack that is a direct sequel from Classic Mario world 1:The Magical Crystals. After the last adventure Bowser decided to get revenge over the mushroom kingdom by forming an evil alliance with various villains from the mushroom's kingdom lands, it's up to Mario to stop him. This new version is a much-improved version over the original release of this hack in 2014.
